title: Victori Song
description: It is the year 1994 in the Adelaide Hills, South AustraliaNine years ago, Loraine Stewart escaped Coven-999 with her newborn niece, Kia. Loraine has tried desperately to protect the girl from the witches who intended to sacrifices her to the gods, but she has failed. Kia Stewart has just been kidnapped.As Loraine's search for the girl begins, Victori Robertson is also searching for something. Having just let go of the stress disorder that controlled her life for years, Tori needs something new to live for. After reading an article about the missing girl, her life begins to change rapidly, as Tori discovers links between her own past and that of Kia Stewart. She realizes that her destiny lies with Kia.
author: Elissa Anne
